mapper.select: SELECT VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_TYPE, OWNER_ID, DURATION, STATUS, RENTAL_PRICE, DEADLINE, LOCATION, VEHICLE_BRAND FROM vehicle WHERE STATUS = 0
SELECT ORDER_ID, OWNER_NAME, HIRER_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, VEHICLE_TYPE, STATUS, AMOUNT, VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_BRAND FROM orders WHERE HIRER_NAME = #{HIRER_NAME} AND STATUS = #{STATUS}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(OWNER_NAME, HIRER_NAME, VEHICLE_TYPE, STATUS, VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_BRAND) VALUES (#{OWNER_NAME}, #{HIRER_NAME}, #{VEHICLE_TYPE}, #{STATUS}, #{VEHICLE_ID}, #{VEHICLE_BRAND})
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_ID, OWNER_NAME, HIRER_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, VEHICLE_TYPE, STATUS, AMOUNT, VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_BRAND from orders where HIRER_NAME = #{USER_NAME}
SELECT ORDER_ID, OWNER_NAME, HIRER_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, VEHICLE_TYPE, STATUS, AMOUNT, VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_BRAND from orders where HIRER_NAME = #{USER_NAME} and (STATUS != 3);
